root.name: Extra Innings
root.description: OverviewExtra Innings ("Hakunetsu Pro Yakyuu Ganba League" in Japan) is a baseball sim that uses fictional teams and an anime cartoonish visual style.The player can select between single and two-player modes, and can use one of the twelve pre-made teams, one of the two player-created custom teams or select the All-Star mode which allows the two players to pick and choose team members from any of the twelve teams. There's also a single-player Pennant Mode which pits the human player against five opponents in a long-term (up to 130 games) pennant season, with the overall highest number of wins deciding the victor.Additionally, there is also a Watch mode that allows the player to simply watch a match play out between two AI opponents.
